sentences.sentence: In 1945, James debuted the toy at a Gimbals in Philadelphia.
sentences.translation: 1945年，詹姆斯首次在费城玩具城参加玩具推销会。

sentences.sentence: This turnable can be rotated in its own plane about its axis A. and is mounted on gimbals within a ring.
sentences.translation: 此内转台可在其自身平面内绕其轴线a转动，并装在一个位于圆环里面的常平架上。

sentences.sentence: It may not be the best configuration balance-wise (important with gimbals) but it has worked well so far.
sentences.translation: 它可能不是最好的配置均衡，明智的(与万向支架很重要)，但它一直很好，到目前为止。
